example.eg: Are you finished sorting those cards into alphabetical order?
example.egtrans: 你把这些卡片按字母顺序排好了吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 排序, 排列, 整理

example.eg: I sorted my bills into separate piles for each company.
example.egtrans: 我把每个公司的账单单独归到一起。

example.eg: What sort of dog is it: a German Shepherd?
example.egtrans: 这狗是什么品种的？德国牧羊犬？

example.eg: What sort of program is it?  A game?
example.egtrans: 这是一种什么程序？是游戏吗？

example.eg: He is an odd sort. He barely speaks at all.
example.egtrans: 他是一个奇怪的人，几乎不怎么说话。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 某种人, 某种类型的人, 某种性格的人

example.eg: This sort puts the items with the highest prices at the top of the screen.
example.egtrans: 这种排序会将最贵的东西显示到屏幕的顶部。

example.eg: Julia intended to go home early in order to sort out the dinner arrangements.
example.egtrans: 茱莉亚打算早些回家，以便安排晚餐。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 整理，理清, 计划，安排

example.eg: My son needs to sort out the clothes in the closet.
example.egtrans: 我儿子需要将衣柜里的衣物分门别类地放好。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…分门归类，分门别类地放, 使井井有条, 整理

example.eg: There's a problem with the wifi; hopefully Tech Support can sort it out.
Justin was sorting through a pile of papers, trying to find the electricity bill.

dsense.name: and all that sort of thing

example.eg: They found sea shells, driftwood, and all that sort of thing at the beach.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以及所有类似的事物, 那一类东西, ...什么的

dsense.name: kind of, sort of
dsense.guideword: informal (in a way, to a degree)

example.eg: "Is he your boyfriend?" "Kind of. It's complicated."  I think I'm getting the hang of this now; well, kind of.
example.egtrans: “他是你的男朋友吗？”“差不多吧，这有点复杂。”我想我现在找到了这个的窍门，嗯，算是多少知道些。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 稍微, 有些, 差不多, 算是

dsense.name: nothing of the sort
dsense.guideword: (not at all as described) (强调情况不同)

example.eg: I've done nothing of the sort!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绝对不是这样的，绝对没有

example.eg: "I heard that you borrowed Jane's car without asking her." "Nothing of the sort!"

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绝没有这回事，才不是呢

dsense.name: of any sort, of any kind

example.eg: I like vegetables of any sort.

dsense.name: of that sort, of that kind
separate the wheat from the chaff, sort the wheat from the chaff

trans_examp.trans_cn: 区分优劣, 分清良莠, 分类编码
